potionofbarkskin.name: Potion of Barkskin
potionofbarkskin.material: A bottle measuring at least two cubic inches
potionofbarkskin.incant: I drink a potion of barkskin

potionofrefreshment.name: Potion of Refreshment
potionofrefreshment.material: A bottle measuring at least two cubic inches
potionofrefreshment.incant: I drink a potion of refreshment
potionofrefreshment.effect: Player may instantly Charge a single Magic or Ability.

potionofhealing.name: Potion of Healing
potionofhealing.material: A bottle measuring at least two cubic inches
potionofhealing.incant: I drink a potion of healing

potionoftruedeath.name: Potion of True Death
potionoftruedeath.material: A bottle measuring at least two cubic inches
potionoftruedeath.incant: I drink a potion of true death
potionoftruedeath.effect: Player may not be the target of <ability>Raise Dead, <ability>Steal Life Essence</ability>, <ability>Undead Minion</ability>, or <ability>Vampirism</ability> for the duration of the game.
potionoftruedeath.note: This effect is not removed by <ability>Release</ability>, <ability>Greater Release</ability>, or Respawn.

scrollofadaptiveblessing.name: Scroll of Adaptive Blessing
scrollofadaptiveblessing.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofadaptiveblessing.incant: I read from a scroll of adaptive blessing

scrollofambulant.name: Scroll of Ambulant
scrollofambulant.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofambulant.incant: I read from a scroll of ambulant
scrollofambulant.effect: Player's next magic is affected as per <ability>Ambulant</ability>.
scrollofambulant.limitation: May only be used by Magic Users.

scrollofblessingagainstwounds.name: Scroll of Blessing Against Wounds
scrollofblessingagainstwounds.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofblessingagainstwounds.incant: I read from a scroll of blessing against wounds
scrollofblessingagainstwounds.effect: Player receives the <ability>Blessing Against Wounds</ability> Enchantment.

scrollofextension.name: Scroll of Extension
scrollofextension.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofextension.incant: I read from a scroll of extension
scrollofextension.effect: Player's next magic is affected as per <ability>Extension</ability>.
scrollofextension.limitation: May only be used by Magic Users.

scrollofharden.name: Scroll of Harden
scrollofharden.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofharden.incant: I read from a scroll of harden

scrollofmend.name: Scroll of Mend
scrollofmend.material: A scroll measuring at least fifteen square inches
scrollofmend.incant: I read from a scroll of mend
scrollofmend.effect: Target item is affected as per mend.

amuletofforce.name: Amulet of Force
amuletofforce.material: Pendant or amulet measuring at least one square inch which must be worn around the neck.

amuletofteleport.name: Amulet of Teleport
amuletofteleport.material: Pendant or amulet measuring at least one square inch which must be worn around the neck.

amuletoftracking.name: Amulet of Tracking
amuletoftracking.material: Pendant or amulet measuring at least one square inch which must be worn around the neck.

amuletofshadows.name: Amulet of Shadows
amuletofshadows.material: Pendant or amulet measuring at least one square inch which must be worn around the neck.

braceletofantimagic.name: Bracelet of Anti-Magic
braceletofantimagic.material: Bracelet measuring at least 1" wide worn around the wrist. Must be made of leather or metal and may not be red, yellow, or white.
braceletofantimagic.incant: I draw upon the power of my bracelet of anti-magic
braceletofantimagic.effect: Player receives the <ability>Protection From Magic</ability> Enchantment.

braceletofsolidity.name: Bracelet of Solidity
braceletofsolidity.material: Bracelet measuring at least 1" wide worn around the wrist. Must be made of leather or metal and may not be red, yellow, or white.
braceletofsolidity.effect: Further Effects which make the player Insubstantial, including effects initiated by the player or beneficial effects, fail as per <ability>Planar Grounding</ability>. Bearer must announce "Immune to insubstantial" when this effect is triggered.

braceletofstoneskin.name: Bracelet of Stoneskin
braceletofstoneskin.material: Bracelet measuring at least 1" wide worn around the wrist. Must be made of leather or metal and may not be red, yellow, or white.
braceletofstoneskin.incant: I draw upon the power of my bracer of stoneskin.

braceletofantimagic.name: Bracelet of Anti-Magic
braceletofantimagic.material: Bracelet measuring at least 1" wide worn around the wrist. Must be made of leather or metal and may not be red, yellow, or white.
braceletofantimagic.incant: I draw upon the power of my bracelet of anti-magic
braceletofantimagic.effect: Player receives the <ability>Protection From Magic</ability> Enchantment.
